creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: burgundy cover; samples of popular motifs in study form: dragons, tigers, and small scenes with flowers, feathers, small landscapes; insects, mythical figures, women, and ephemera
markings: square seal first page URC; round seal last page LLC; sticker back cover LLC
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Pictorial Designs for All Artisans (Banshoku zukō 万職図考), vol. 1
